content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Stone Furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace entity at position (0.0, 0.0) with a furnace source and result.

### Burner Mining Drill at position(1.0, 0.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill entity at position (1.0, 0.0).

### Burner Mining Drill at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of a burner mining drill entity at position (41.0, -82.0).

### Wooden Chest at position(40.5, -83.5)
Consists of a wooden chest entity at position (40.5, -83.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when harvesting without being close to the resource
- Make sure to move to the target resource entity where you want to harvest from before harvesting items.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Ensure you are close enough to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance is 10 units.

### Errors when extracting without having ingredients
- Ensure that the entity has the required ingredients before attempting to extract items.

### Errors when placing entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure that you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it.

### Errors when crafting without required sub-ingredients
- Ensure that you have all the required sub-ingredients before attempting to craft an item. Some resources, like wood, must be gathered first as they do not have a crafting recipe.
